main: You there. You look human but you smell like a demon! Where do your allegiances lie?
branch_1: You take me for a fool, man-thing? Let's see how well you jabber with your jaw hanging around your neck.
branch_2: Then you are a human. In which case Lord Caliburn would see his tower consecrated with your blood.
branch_3: Yes. As do all true demons. Forgive my inconsideration. Please go on ahead.
branch_4: The Ashura-O? Wow, then you must be a great warrior. Please go on ahead!
